website_summaries.verdict: As the name indicates, these casual shoes are best for active, outdoor occasions. Not as good as other styles for all-day, heavy activity.
pros: Mesh gives room for feet to swell
Can be used in the water
Easy to put on your feet
Adjustable hook-and-loop closure at heel strap
Comes in a variety of colors
cons: Heel strap is too short for wide ankles

customer_reviews.title: Mom shoes
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these shoes for my mother they were for her birthday. My mother is in a wheel chair from a stroke and the doctor told her that her feet needed some air so I had been looking for shoes for her. My mother has problems with her feet which makes it difficult to find shoes to fit. Since her illness her left foot is bigger than the right so she needs an adjustable therapeutic shoe. Most of the therapeutic shoes she doesn't like or they are too expensive so I got these and she liked them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for swollen feet!!!
customer_reviews.text: This would be the perfect shoe for someone with swollen feet. I bought the size that I normally have to buy to be roomy enough for me because women's shoes tend to run narrow. I should have bought a regular M width instead of wide because this shoe is wide to begin with.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy C. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Best for really wide feet
customer_reviews.text: Very nice shoe. The footbed was wide (which I ordered). But while my feet are wide, my instep is pretty flat. Had to return because mess was just too baggy on my foot. If you have high arches or the circumference of your foot is extra wide- this is a great shoe.
customer_reviews.author: AZ2

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and Colorful Shoes
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are very comfortable. Don't want to take them off. I have a hard time wearing sandals so when I saw these I thought I would give them a try and they worked out great. I would recommend them to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Judy Michels

customer_reviews.title: A winner for me -:)
customer_reviews.text: I was pleasantly surprised these fit so well. I have a wide fit and some wide shoes are still to narrow for my feet. I have many pairs I avoid and if I was honest would dump. These felt good out f the box so that’s always a god sign. I also tried them in the afternoon so if feet were a little more swollen it would als be a good test. The back strap is comfortable and the mesh breathable and cool. Not sure I believe these are glamor shoes but I’ll take comfort anytime! I would recommend these sturdy sorta Sandals shoes for comfort to the store, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Newman

customer_reviews.title: How disappointing...
customer_reviews.text: These sandals were very disappointing. They fit oddly in places you dont need them to, and they don't fit in places that you need them to. I would liken wearing these to wearing two more tough brown paper bags on my feet. They sag on the sides as if to accommodate what I would imagine would be feet love handles. And I've never seen feet like that. I wanted to like this sandal because I need something that will allow for air flow while also being comfortable. I am diabetic and have needs for such a shoe. Unfortunately I can't afford any of the other sandals or slides Propet sells. How disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Beth C.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my wide, flat feet
customer_reviews.text: I love these sandals. I bought an ugly color because the price dropped in my size. I don’t even care because they’re comfortable. There is no arch support, but I’ve never found a sandal that does so it doesn’t matter to me. I’ll be watching for the price to drop so I can buy another pair.
customer_reviews.author: Ladyflower

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed in sizing.
customer_reviews.text: I was probably too optimistic this would fit properly. I had another pair of shoes from this company that fit great and lasted a long time. As we are coming into the summer months, I thought this might be lighter and cooler. I ordered my usual size based on the reviews, but I can't even get it on my foot. I did not find any return information in the packaging. At this point, I will try to stretch it a bit to see if it will be wearable. Otherwise, I think my daughter will be getting a pair of shoes for her birthday. Hope they fit her.
customer_reviews.author: Ellessay

customer_reviews.title: Good Diabetic Shoe for the right foot
customer_reviews.text: These are definitely comfortable if you can get past the too short of a heel strap if you have any kind of a wide ankle. I have Lymphedema and they are too small on their own, but I added a piece of velcro and they work okay, except the strap still sometimes won't hold. I like the full cover of the top of the foot, in that it gives you more security. The shoe itself is very comfortable. The sole is nice and it has a wide platform so that makes for a more comfortable feel.
customer_reviews.author: Mamanita

customer_reviews.title: Great for fashion and orthropedics!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a relative that needed surgery on their foot but had to postpone the surgery for other health issues. In the meantime, they couldn't fit into their regular shoes so I bought these shoes. They love the shoes and even wears them around the home and they want them in every color. A male relative who doesn't like their feet out said they would wear something like this.
customer_reviews.author: K. Donuyale

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable!!
customer_reviews.text: I really like these. They were a tad too wide, but my feet are in between widths. The sole is comfortable and flexible. They are on the quiet side walking on laminate floors. Nice grippy tread too. Overall, I’m very happy with these sandals for my very hard to fit duck feet.
customer_reviews.author: KBarton

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE these shoes!  Generally I really don't like to purchase items such as shoes online
customer_reviews.text: I really don't like to purchase items such as shoes online. I have problems with my feet and always find it necessary to try on a shoe or sneaker before purchasing it. But I decided to go for it! I read the reviews that had been posted and they were very accurate. I am anywhere from a 6 1/2 to 7 1/2. I purchased size 7M which was perfect. I really like the look of these open-toed, lightweight, sneaker-like sandals with adjustable velcro strap. Plus they are so comfortable. I am very happy with this purchase. (I had never tried on or purchased a Propet Women's sandal or shoe prior to this).
customer_reviews.author: Ruth

customer_reviews.title: Fun Funky Shoes with Great Comfort
customer_reviews.text: These were a "deal" in the hot pink and white color and I suspected that they were going to look funky and make a statement on my feet, but the mesh breathability and the ease of putting them on and the feeling like you're walking on clouds, makes them a great find. I wear a 9N and have hammer toes but no bunions and these are so comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Swan Girl

customer_reviews.title: Awkward to wear, unattractive
customer_reviews.text: These are awkward. They look like orthopedic shoes. Also they make a loud popping noise when the sole of the shoe leaves the sole of your foot. I sent one pair back because they were too narrow, this pair is too long. I felt like they would trip me.
customer_reviews.author: Lori Safranek

customer_reviews.title: I will keep trying because I think they are a nice shoe and they fit well and the design is ...
customer_reviews.text: I am still trying to get used to them. They cover more of my foot and my regular sandals and the heel strap is a little bit bothersome but I have very tender feet. I will keep trying because I think they are a nice shoe and they fit well and the design is very pleasant. If they work out well I will get more pro pet shoes
customer_reviews.author: travler

customer_reviews.title: So very comfortable 😊👍🏻!!️
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are a dream 😊 They run large so best to perhaps go half size smaller. Highly wearable and tuff but very easy to wash (even while wearing them if gardening) and so very light you hardly feel you are wearing them. The colors are very pleasing - love the fit and the design. The seller eager to help you find the right size.
customer_reviews.author: miamiladybug

customer_reviews.title: Unhappy with Design, Width and over all impression
customer_reviews.text: I am very unhappy with the shoes, it has zero (0) style. I was not impressed about the look for the sandals. I do not even suggest it to Senior. It was super lose and there was no way to adjust it. I returned it the next day.
customer_reviews.author: THE DCs

customer_reviews.title: Good arch support with comfortable foam insoles
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for summer golf sandals as they have a fair amount of tread. I have wide feet and high arches and these sandals fit perfectly with good arch support and nice memory type foam insoles making them very comfy. Would definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Cauvet

customer_reviews.title: Great sandal for elderly with toe, swelling issues
customer_reviews.text: This is a fantastic shoe for the elderly who struggle with swelling or toe issues. Bought this for my elderly mom, who has problems with her toes hitting the end of even the softest shoes. Adjustable velcro strap on the heel makes a big difference. Mother has lots of swelling, so we bought it in the EE width. Propet makes the best shoes for three elderly IMHO.
customer_reviews.author: Wicki

customer_reviews.title: meh
customer_reviews.text: it served the purpose when i had toe operation and could not abide the "shoe" the podiatrist "sold" me
customer_reviews.author: katydids

customer_reviews.title: Casual sandals
customer_reviews.text: These are nice sandals but I had to return them as they were too wide. I have a narrow foot and even though I purchased a narrow, they were too wide. I would still recommend them to anyone who needs a nice pair of sandals.
customer_reviews.author: Janice Gray

customer_reviews.title: Great Sandal
customer_reviews.text: These are some of the most comfortable sandals I have ever had. I have 2 pair. My only concern is the light insole shows dirt real bad, I live in dirt, but I have machine washed them with some luck. They aren't completely stain free, but thinking I might get a 3rd pair, and wear just one pair camping and hiking.
customer_reviews.author: SLL

customer_reviews.title: Propet Travelactiv Sandals
customer_reviews.text: Propet's comfort is something I've come to expect and they haven't let me down yet. Until now, my collection of Propet shoes were for Fall and Winter wear. But, these sandals were on sale and I thought I'd take a chance. I was delighted. They are sooo comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Retaflady

customer_reviews.title: I’d recommend them to everyone looking for a pretty and comfortable sandal.
customer_reviews.text: I have neuropathy of the feet and didn’t know if these would be comfortable. They are great! They’re comfortable, roomy, stretchy material, and one of the only shoes that hasn’t hurt my feet in four months.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE LOVE LOVE THESE!!
customer_reviews.text: I have an extremely hard to fit foot... I wear a women's size 6 4E and sometimes THAT IS TOO NARROW!! NEVER have I been able to just put on a shoe and be comfortable... NOT SO WITH THESE WONDERFUL SHOES!!! THANK YOU PROPET!!!
customer_reviews.author: Vickie Peunic

customer_reviews.title: I loved theses shoes
customer_reviews.text: I loved theses shoes. Unlike some of the other reviews I did not think they ran big. I ordered my usual size and they fit perfect. Very comfortable. Not the most stylish shoe in the world but they are perfect when I want comfort and function over style
customer_reviews.author: Brenda j.

customer_reviews.title: Great sandals!!
customer_reviews.text: I love these sandals. This is my third pair. Will order again!!
customer_reviews.author: Satisfied Customer

customer_reviews.title: Smaller Than The Usual Propet's
customer_reviews.text: Having to send these back. The sizing wasn't the same as the other Propet shoes I have. Theses were much smaller. The quality is the same, so if you are considering these shoes you may want to order up a size and width.
customer_reviews.author: Dennyintx

customer_reviews.title: Really pretty, and they fit perfectly, even in the heel.
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes! My feet are wide in the pad, but not wide at all in the heel, so I love that I can tighten these to fit.
customer_reviews.author: Denise Smith

customer_reviews.title: very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: What I like is the strap in back keeps the shoe on. I'm always falling off flip flops when my feet are wet from the pool.
customer_reviews.author: Marie B.

customer_reviews.title: Just OK
customer_reviews.text: I really love older Propet styles and am finding the new ones don't compete. Please consider bringing back the Corinne sandal.
customer_reviews.author: Judith

customer_reviews.title: Had to Return
customer_reviews.text: I had to return the shoe. It fit okay but as others have said it made a noise when I walked in it. I wanted a shoe I could slip on without socks and the only way I would have been able to wear it is with socks because of the sound. It is a lightweight nice looking and fitting shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne G. Wills

customer_reviews.title: These are VERY comfortable! I have a lot of feet problems and ...
customer_reviews.text: These are VERY comfortable! I have a lot of feet problems and it is very difficult to find something I actually like to wear! I will probably order more colors at some point! The only negative thing I have to say is that the toe opening tends to get a little tight and sometimes causes my toes to swell, but they are still more comfortable than most shoes I have.
customer_reviews.author: Flick Chic

customer_reviews.title: Super comfortable. I was hoping it would look modern ...
customer_reviews.text: Super comfortable. I was hoping it would look modern and trendy, but it’s actually orthopedic in appearance. My friends mock me but I’m keeping anyway. Missed the return deadline! 5 Star for comfort. 0 Star for appearance.
customer_reviews.author: Julie C

customer_reviews.title: Love them. Bought another air
customer_reviews.text: So comfortable. Get compliments on them all the time. Did I say so comfortable!!!
customer_reviews.author: Tracy

customer_reviews.title: Not for wide feet
customer_reviews.text: I normally wear 2E width, but bought 4E for extra room. My feet were hanging off the sides of the shoes!
customer_reviews.author: LolaInTexas

customer_reviews.title: very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: purchased these to wear around the house and they are very comfortable and support the arches.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Ann

customer_reviews.title: The fabric over the top of the shoe is much ...
customer_reviews.text: The fabric over the top of the shoe is much too loose and cannot be adjusted. I have a high arch but this is way too loose a fit.
customer_reviews.author: RSBVT

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable sandles
customer_reviews.text: I love the sandals very comfortable! I would have liked a different color but the blue is pretty and goes well in Florida. I would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: shaysenpai

customer_reviews.title: My favorite sandals!!
customer_reviews.text: I have 3 pair of these—so comfortable, easy to put on and stylish. Good tread on the bottom and I like that with my toe amputations they fit as one solid breathable piece across my foot. Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.author: Deet

customer_reviews.title: Just perfect for sore feet !
customer_reviews.text: Just love these wide fitting soft soled sandals. I have fibromyalgia and these are so comfortable to wear as they are very spongy underfoot.I have put in a light orthotic and it works perfectly.Excellent price and speedy delivery to New Zealand in time for summer.
customer_reviews.author: Lois Connelly

customer_reviews.title: Defective soiled top of sandal
customer_reviews.text: There was a 1/2" soiled spot on the top of the sandal. I didn't want the hassle of returning and figured I could remove the spot. Tried everything and no luck. A definite defect so I would not recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Vicki Dryden

customer_reviews.title: comfortable
customer_reviews.text: In the picture it doesn't look very nice but it's actually cute. Very comfortable and the velcro is a definite plus. would recommend it for sure.
customer_reviews.author: edna s janian

customer_reviews.title: Love this brand of shoe
customer_reviews.text: Love this brand of shoe! They are sized right, light weight and so comfortable. I wear these boating. They have a nice sole for water soaked surfaces.
customer_reviews.author: M. W.

customer_reviews.title: Not for problem feet
customer_reviews.text: Returned this item. I thought it would have better arch support. Probably fine for average person, but I suffer with plantar fasciitis. So this is not a shoe that works for me.
customer_reviews.author: Taryn S.

customer_reviews.title: comfortable on your feet shoes
customer_reviews.text: These are ugly, but extremely comfortable. I use them inside the house on warm days and can stand easily while doing household chores and cooking.
customer_reviews.author: Josephine

customer_reviews.title: A Great Fit and a Great Purchase!
customer_reviews.text: These are very very comfortable. I even got them complete wet at the beach and didn't regret it. A great purchase! I would like them better if the sole was black and not white....still very happy with them.
customer_reviews.author: Pcblackb from Houston

customer_reviews.title: Extremely comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: I like these shoes really well. I now have a total of four pairs in different colors.
customer_reviews.author: Angie

customer_reviews.title: Runs wide
customer_reviews.text: Really liked these shoes and very disappointed to find they were way too large for me. These were a AA so thought they would be OK but were way too wide for me.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer Lulu reader

customer_reviews.title: Shoes
customer_reviews.text: I Love these shoes...They are the most comfortable shoes I've had in a Long time. Would recommend them to anyone who has foot problems.
customer_reviews.author: Terry

customer_reviews.title: She says they are very comfortable and beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Comfy sandals. I bough it for my mom and she loves them. She says they are very comfortable and beautiful. I really recommende. I will buy another pair or her
customer_reviews.author: cristina

customer_reviews.title: Great sandals for wide feet !!
customer_reviews.text: Love the sandals and I have a very wide foot, got a xx wide first , sent back way too large and got a wide and it fits great. Very comfy!!
customer_reviews.author: Marilyn

customer_reviews.title: Glad I found these
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable mix between a running shoe (bottom) and a slipper like sandle top. I get a lot of complements when I wear these and it feels like I'm in my slippers. The fit is a little wide and comfy.
customer_reviews.author: Shamai

customer_reviews.title: Look like the picture, not as color described
customer_reviews.text: These are VERY comfortable and fits as expected. The reason I'm giving it 4 stars they ARE NOT Red/Black which I'd hoped for. They look just like pictured. Pink throughout as well as the stripe.
customer_reviews.author: AprilFool

customer_reviews.title: A great find. Ordered another pair in a different color
customer_reviews.text: Love them! Finally a sandal that fits my wide feet. The cushion is amazing. Comfortable, and I just received my second pair.
customer_reviews.author: Cori Ridenhour

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable water type sandal
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable water type sandal. I usually wear an 8 1/2 N . I ordered an 8 N and 81/2N. I kept the 8 N as the 8 1/2 was too big.
customer_reviews.author: On The Farm

customer_reviews.title: Love them
customer_reviews.text: Good fit, comfortable. I am short and have arthritis so it is hard for me to use shoes with side attachments but easier due to Velcro strap. Looks good. Good support all over
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: The wide runs really wide
customer_reviews.text: Too wide so I'm returning today. I'll buy the same shoe again in a medium width.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love them. They would be really comfortable if they ...
customer_reviews.text: I love them. They would be really comfortable if they fit. I need a EEEE shoe to be comfortable. I also ordered the $E and they fit fine. The layer of foam on the top of the sole are just wonderful and make my sore feet feel sooooooooooooo good.
customer_reviews.author: Urbana Grammie

customer_reviews.title: Good for walking
customer_reviews.text: Little bit larger than expected. Make my feet look big. Comfortable for walking long distances
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Johnson

customer_reviews.title: perfect
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a cute shoe in 9EEEE and so happy I got these! They are comfortable and nice looking as well. I now have red, black and silver.
customer_reviews.author: BonVoyage

customer_reviews.title: Comfy enough to wear all day.
customer_reviews.text: Nice shoe for anyone with foot problems. Soft material. Comfortable for all day wear.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Super comfortable fit
customer_reviews.text: I wear a 7 EEEE and got a size larger. They're were actually a little wider than I thought. Super comfortable fit. I just expected them to look "cooler" as I thought I could wear them teaching HS students. I'm wearing them to snorkel as a water shoe.
customer_reviews.author: JMiller

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable. I ordered 4E as I have WIDE feet ...
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable. I ordered 4E as I have WIDE feet and they swell-these shoes are well wide enough. They fit great. They are comfortable and supportive. They run long- I could have ordered a half size smaller. I am thinking I will buy another pair in a different color.
customer_reviews.author: Julie F.

customer_reviews.title: We'd normally order an 8 4E but had to send ...
customer_reviews.text: We'd normally order an 8 4E but had to send it back as it was much wider thatn the Propet tennis shoes my mom normally wears. Re-ordered in just a wide width not the 4E and those fit perfect
customer_reviews.author: Jeannie Hughes

customer_reviews.title: True to size and width!
customer_reviews.text: I needed a pair of shoes to take on a cruise to the Eastern Carribbean. These shoes are great for my vacation.
customer_reviews.author: Gail Chesser

customer_reviews.title: Soft sole... great!
customer_reviews.text: Feels softer than I thought. Velcro piece not very moveable!
customer_reviews.author: L Rivera

customer_reviews.title: Too big
customer_reviews.text: I bought these, but I really didn't like them. I found them to be to bulky, and too wide, these are good shoes for a person that has a really wide foot.
customer_reviews.author: martha o

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes!
customer_reviews.text: Great shoes! I wear a 10WW and they fit great and are very flattering! I will be ordering more colors!
customer_reviews.author: furbymom

customer_reviews.title: Matching shoes
customer_reviews.text: had another pair of these in lilac color. liked them. ordered more. These match the flowers in my dress. it is fun 7 I like them a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Desert Granny

customer_reviews.title: i'm keeping them since it feels like i'm walking on air
customer_reviews.text: Wish it were a little narrower, I wear a 7.5AA, and this is a bit wide. That said, i'm keeping them since it feels like i'm walking on air. Taking them on a trip and if they still feel great, i'll get other colors when i return.
customer_reviews.author: Creative lady

customer_reviews.title: The shoe is very comfortable and appears to be made well
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this shoe and the size is large. ordered smaller size and still too large. The shoe is very comfortable and appears to be made well.
customer_reviews.author: Kitty lover

customer_reviews.title: They are very comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: I wear propet slip ons for the winter and the propet sandals in the summer. They are very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Margery Lovely

customer_reviews.title: not to my taste
customer_reviews.text: looked better in the picture, in reality they were ugly to me, returned them
customer_reviews.author: marilyn

customer_reviews.title: Still trying out
customer_reviews.text: Wear an 8 but had to go to an 8 1/2. Run short. Other than that, I think they will be fine. Very lightweight. Hope they breathe. We will see.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie Spayde

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: Bit on the large size with double wide. Would reorder, but only in wide. Do not like the colors available, would like more choices.
customer_reviews.author: sharon k. molter

customer_reviews.title: Walking on air!
customer_reviews.text: I have very sensitive feet but am able to wear these shoes for an entire day!
customer_reviews.author: Mary C

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable!!
customer_reviews.text: I have hammertoes and need open toe shoes! Most are not comfortable! But the shoes are great. Just like sneakers; but with open toe!
customer_reviews.author: bheimall

customer_reviews.title: Best Sandler
customer_reviews.text: Bought these as a gift for my mom since no Sandler’s ever fit her these fit great
customer_reviews.author: Laurie Griffith

customer_reviews.title: Comfort
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are the second pair of this particular shoe, just a different. Fit great and so so comfortable. Are great shoes for walking. Recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: Frances A. Hedrick

customer_reviews.title: Love them. Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Love them. Very comfortable. Can wear all day without discomfort.
customer_reviews.author: Jakey

customer_reviews.title: Love them
customer_reviews.text: Fits nicely, but the fabric stretches, so you have to tighten them when that happens. They are so soft to walk on, makes them worth it
customer_reviews.author: SAV

customer_reviews.title: Best walking shoe/sandal
customer_reviews.text: My favorite sandal for walking. Flexible and very soft sole. Best shoe ever.
customer_reviews.author: bobbie2

customer_reviews.title: Like this Sandal
customer_reviews.text: They fit me well and I have a rather wide foot. I don't mind the heel strap yet, but haven't really worn them for a long enough session yet.
customer_reviews.author: DianeMS

customer_reviews.title: Comfy!
customer_reviews.text: A little big but very comfortable. Hard to keep the white clean.
customer_reviews.author: Mare3.0

customer_reviews.title: Casual Comfort
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable casual sandal for Summer. Easy to slide on and stays in place with fully adjustable heel strap with Velcro closure. I can wear these all day.
customer_reviews.author: Jacki B.

customer_reviews.title: Ugly shoe
customer_reviews.text: These were horrible looking on your feet. It looked like a boot that I had to wear when I broke my ankle. Plus there is no support.
customer_reviews.author: m. green

customer_reviews.title: purple sandals
customer_reviews.text: Propet shoes run true to size, as do these. They are very comfortable, and a great color.
customer_reviews.author: susanlk

customer_reviews.title: Good fit
customer_reviews.text: They are so comfortable even after and day of shopping.
customer_reviews.author: Jannou

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money paid
customer_reviews.text: The back strap needs to be longer for Velcro to overlap sufficiently. I have never worn these and it was too late by the time I finally tried them on to return them--box thrown away, receipt shredded, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great quality and fit. Hope to purchase another pair for the summer!
customer_reviews.author: Betsy Ross

customer_reviews.title: Yay, cute and functional!
customer_reviews.text: I have some pretty wide feet that swell sometimes. These shoes not only fit, which is a god send in and of itself, but they're REALLY cute, too! Really easy to put on, super comfortable to walk around in. I'm so happy I bought these!
customer_reviews.author: M. Hansen

customer_reviews.title: ❤️
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely loved them. Wore them all day on the day they arrived. Very comfortable!
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn D. Goodworth

customer_reviews.title: very comfy. The only thin is that there is ...
customer_reviews.text: very comfy. The only thin is that there is no arch support. But I have my own inserts and it works out well.
customer_reviews.author: Lorelei

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight. Will work well around water.
customer_reviews.text: Light weight. Fits well. Little arch support. Will be good around water.
customer_reviews.author: Martha

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable. I like the style a lot
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable. I like the style a lot, but they do sort of look orthotic. I would recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: Kay

customer_reviews.title: Beautifully made comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Beautifully made comfortable, good for walking around the pool , light weight but a little larger than I expected
customer_reviews.author: NQ

customer_reviews.title: Good buy.
customer_reviews.text: This sandle gives firm support and is comfortable to wear.
customer_reviews.author: Margaret I. Park

customer_reviews.title: Walking Sandals
customer_reviews.text: Haven't had them long but they seem to be good walking sandals which is what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy G.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These Propet Sandals are extremely comfortable! Will definitely buy again!
customer_reviews.author: pattikeane

product_meta.title: Propét Women's TravelActiv Ss Sandal
product_meta.description:
Open toed sporty sandal on our most popular traveltek outsole is and amazingly light and durable combination for hours on your feet. wide widths and breathable, flexible upper construction mean the perfect fit for any hard to fit feet! perfect shoe for travel, beach and poolside.

Propet is a rapidly growing shoe company dedicated to making the worlds best walking shoes. Propet shoes are better walking shoes because they're designed and manufactured to be your most comfortable walking experience ever. Extra attention is paid to giving your foot support where it is needed, more cushy comfort where it counts and more room where your foot's moving parts need freedom when walking. The result has to be tried to be believed! Shouldn't you be wearing the world's best walking shoes?
